TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit KeyboardNavigation extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可焦點化物件之間的邏輯巡覽和方向式巡覽。

span.span: Provides logical and directional navigation between focusable objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會負責實作預設的鍵盤焦點導覽，按下其中一個導覽鍵時。The class is responsible for implementing default keyboard focus navigation when one of the navigation keys is pressed. 導覽鍵是：索引鍵 索引標籤、 Shift + Tab、 Ctrl + Tab、 Ctrl + Shift + Tab、 UpArrow、 向下箭號、 LeftArrow 和向右鍵。The navigation keys are: Tab, Shift+Tab, Ctrl+Tab, Ctrl+Shift+Tab, UpArrow, DownArrow, LeftArrow, and RightArrow keys. 邏輯巡覽的範例使用 tab 鍵將焦點移。An example of logical navigation is using the tab key to move focus. 方向式巡覽的範例使用方向鍵將焦點移。An example of directional navigation is using the arrow keys to move focus. ## Examples 下列範例會建立數目的物件。The following example creates a with a number of objects. 附加的屬性設定為上。The attached property is set to on the . 這表示當使用 tab 鍵在變更焦點、 焦點會移動每個項目和最後一個項目到達時就會回到第一個項目。This means that when focus is changed using the tab key within the , focus will move from each element and when the last element is reached focus will return to the first element. [!code-xaml[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationxaml)] [!code-csharp[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)] [!code-vb[MarkupSnippets#MarkupKeyboardNavigationTabNavigationCODE](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MarkupSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#markupkeyboardnavigationtabnavigationcode)]

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否接受 Return 字元。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Return character is accepted by a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly AcceptsReturnProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定有設定此屬性之項目子系的邏輯控制項定位巡覽行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the logical control tab navigation behavior for the children of the element that this property is set on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會指定容器將如何移動焦點發生控制項定位巡覽時。This property specifies how the container will move the focus when control tab navigation occurs. 使用 CTRL + TAB 按鍵組合叫用控制項定位巡覽。Control tab navigation is invoked by using the CTRL+TAB key combination. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

Public Shared ReadOnly ControlTabNavigationProperty As DependencyProperty

summary.span: 識別 附加屬性。

span.span: Identifies the attached property.

summary.span: 取得或設定有設定此屬性之項目子系的方向式巡覽行為。

span.span: Gets or sets the directional navigation behavior for the children of the element that this property is set on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方向式巡覽是使用方向鍵來叫用。Directional navigation is invoked by using the arrow keys. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 TAB 鍵叫用索引標籤瀏覽。Tab navigation is invoked by using the TAB key. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例會建立數目的物件。The following example creates a with a number of objects. 附加的屬性設定為上。The attached property is set to on the . 這表示當使用 tab 鍵在變更焦點、 焦點會移動每個項目和最後一個項目到達時就會回到第一個項目。This means that when focus is changed using the tab key within the , focus will move from each element and when the last element is reached focus will return to the first element.
